name: Akhil Bhartiya Gramin Uthan Samiti
briefDescription: Akhil Bhartiya Gramin Uthan Samiti (ABGUS) is a civil society organization working the empowerment and participation of deprived, excluded and vulnerable section of the community. ABGUS reaches out to more than 5300 children, their families and communities’ everyday under the direct care and support programs for their sustainable holistic development.ABGUS was formed by group of consentaneous young person’s coming from all areas in years 1987 since then; ABGUS has been working for the socio-economic empowerment of the rural people. The organization has made its significant presence felt in block Tijara of district Alwar, district Udaipur and Jhalawar  of state Rajasthan through years of closely working with the communities.
